data.1: I CALL TO witness the early hours of morning,
data.2: And the night when dark and still,
data.3: Your Lord has neither left you, nor despises you.
data.4: What is to come is better for you than what has gone before;
data.5: For your Lord will certainly give you, and you will be content.
data.6: Did He not find you an orphan and take care of you?
data.7: Did He not find you perplexed, and show you the way?
data.8: Did He not find you poor and enrich you?
data.9: So do not oppress the orphan,
data.10: And do not drive the beggar away,
data.11: And keep recounting the favours of your Lord.
